text:
How to use this AI to restore old photos for $0.04.

1. Go to "Replicate".
2. Click on "flux-context-apps" → "restore-image".
3. On "input_image" → choose an image to restore.

☑ What it is – restore-image is a ready-made FLUX Kontext app on Replicate that “restores, fixes scratches and damage, and colorizes old photos."

☑ Runs & cost – Publicly available with ≈2 k runs so far and priced at about $0.04 per image on Replicate’s pay-as-you-go plan. 

Access it here: https://lnkd.in/dY4S4K55

☑ Commercial use – All FLUX Kontext apps hosted by Replicate, including restore-image, can be used in commercial projects. 

☑ Why it matters – No need to fine-tune or set up local GPUs; the heavy lifting happens on Replicate’s servers. Natural-language prompts remove Photoshop’s learning curve – perfect for archivists, genealogy buffs, or social media throwback posts.
